thread.title: Tony Parker is nerding out on 'Back to the Future' Day with a souped-up DeLorean
thread.title_full: Tony Parker is nerding out on 'Back to the Future' Day with a souped-up DeLorean

author: Dan Carson, Bleacher Report
title: Tony Parker is nerding out on 'Back to the Future' Day with a souped-up DeLorean
text: Tony Parker is nerding out on 'Back to the Future' Day with a souped-up DeLorean Comment By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report VVdailypress.com By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 12:02 PM By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 12:02 PM » Social News Hello, and welcome to another Internet article showcasing Back to the Future -related content on this fine #BackToTheFutureDay we're having. As you'll note, today is October 21, 2015—the exact date Doc Brown and Marty McFly plugged into the DeLorean before that fateful trip to the future 30 years ago. This is a big deal to someone like the San Antonio Spurs' Tony Parker, who seems to have been waiting for the perfect opportunity to break out his DeLorean for the cameras. I don't know if Parker actually owns a DeLorean (update: heck yes he does ), but I wouldn't put it past him. With all due respect, he seems like a huge nerd: By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report VVdailypress.com By Dan Carson, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 12:02 PM » Comment or view comments " data-width="650" data-numposts="20" data-colorscheme="light"> » STAY INFORMED
